metadata.title: Hearty - Cross-Generational Voice Communication Platform
metadata.description: A warm communication platform where all generations from teens to 80s+ can anonymously share voice messages as mentors, peers, and friends. Features senior-friendly design for everyone.
metadata.keywords: intergenerational communication, voice messages, mentor, peer, friend, anonymous chat, senior-friendly, warm conversation, generational empathy

hero.subtitle:

features.title: Hearty's Unique Communication Experience
features.subtitle: An intergenerational exchange platform for all ages

items.title: Cross-Generational Mentoring
items.description: Where seniors' life wisdom meets young people's passion for mutual learning and growth

items.title: Anonymous Voice Communication
items.description: Share genuine, warm hearts through voice only in a comfortable anonymous environment

items.title: Interest-Based Matching
items.description: Natural connections through shared interests: health, hobbies, music, family, life wisdom, and learning

items.title: Senior-Friendly Design
items.description: Large fonts, simple controls, and intuitive interface for comfortable use by all ages

items.title: Diverse Communication Styles
items.description: Listener, Sharer, Balanced, Questioner - communicate comfortably in your own style

items.title: Safe Communication Environment
items.description: Systematic management for privacy protection and healthy conversation culture

generations.title: All Generations Together on Hearty
generations.subtitle: Warm connections celebrating each generation's unique character

items.description: Share rich life experiences and wisdom while offering warm advice to younger generations
Encourage each other and become life companions with peers facing similar challenges
Share fresh trends and vibrant energy while building generational connections with seniors

howItWorks.title: Start Warm Communication in 3 Simple Steps
howItWorks.subtitle: Intuitive usage that anyone can easily participate in

steps.title: Set Up Profile
steps.description: Create your unique profile by selecting age group, interests, and communication style

steps.title: Create Voice Message
steps.description: Leave a warm voice message under 1 minute on topics that interest you

steps.title: Cross-Generational Communication
steps.description: Listen to messages from other generations and start meaningful exchanges by responding

items.message: Talking with young people makes me feel young again. It's rewarding that my experiences can help.
When struggling with parenting and work, talking with people who have similar concerns brings comfort.
Listening to life advice from elders makes me reflect on my own life. It's truly precious time.

cta.title: Start Warm Communication Right Now
cta.subtitle: There are people waiting for your voice

footer.description: Hearty is a cross-generational voice communication platform. A special space where all ages anonymously exchange voice messages and connect as mentors, peers, and friends.
